mapper.select: SELECT attr.id AS itemId, attr.`label` AS itemName, 'attr' AS type, show_type AS showType, v.sort FROM cmdb_attr attr LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON attr.`ci_id` = v.`ci_id` AND attr.`id` = v.`item_id` AND v.`type` = 'attr' WHERE attr.`ci_id` = #{value} UNION SELECT rel.id AS itemId, rel.name AS itemName, 'rel' AS type, show_type AS showType, v.sort FROM cmdb_rel rel LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON rel.from_ci_id = v.`ci_id` AND rel.id = v.`item_id` AND v.`type` = 'rel' WHERE rel.from_ci_id = #{value} UNION SELECT rel.id AS itemId, rel.name AS itemName, 'rel' AS type, show_type AS showType, v.sort FROM cmdb_rel rel LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON rel.to_ci_id = v.`ci_id` AND rel.id = v.`item_id` AND v.`type` = 'rel' WHERE rel.to_ci_id = #{value} ORDER BY sort,TYPE,itemId
